document_data.title: The Art of Neverwinter Nights
document_data.author: [[Ray Muzyka]], [[Greg Zeschuk]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''The Art of Neverwinter Nights''''' is a non-fiction book showing concept art and images used for the ''[[Neverwinter Nights]]'' video game. It was released by [[BioWare]] on January 1, 2002 and has a foreword by [[Ray Muzyka]] and [[Greg Zeschuk]], Joint CEOs and Co-Executive producers of BioWare Corp.
